code: @Test public void testJmsSelector() throws Exception {     // must start CamelContext because use route builder is false     context.start().     template.sendBodyAndHeader("activemq:foo", "Hello World", "foo", "123").     template.sendBodyAndHeader("activemq:foo", "Bye World", "foo", "456").     String body = consumer.receiveBody("activemq:foo?selector=foo='456'", 5000, String.class).     assertEquals("Bye World", body).     body = consumer.receiveBody("activemq:foo", 5000, String.class).     assertEquals("Hello World", body). }

protected CamelContext createCamelContext() throws Exception {     CamelContext camelContext = super.createCamelContext().     // must be persistent to rember the messages     ConnectionFactory connectionFactory = CamelJmsTestHelper.createPersistentConnectionFactory().     JmsComponent component = jmsComponentTransacted(connectionFactory).     camelContext.addComponent("activemq", component).     return camelContext. }
